works.complaint:
RE:	Notice to refrain from unlawful conduct and to  
preserve evidence

Dear Sirs,

We take the liberty to inform you that we have been asked by our clients -  
Mr. Mgr. Jaroslav Haščák, DOB 30 August 1969, permanent residence Križkova  
ul. 9, 811 04 Bratislava, citizen of Slovak Republic, and Mr. Ing. Zoltán  
Varga, DOB 21 July 1966, permanent residence Fedinova ul. 2/1134, 851 01  
Bratislava, citizen of Slovak Republic - they mandated us to represent them  
in the matter referred to below.

On 8 January 2012 we have been informed that your website "google.com" has  
published documents concerning the so-called "Gorilla" case, which,  
according to unsubstantiated allegations, contain transcripts of alleged  
interceptions of our clients. On the said website, we have identified the  
following communication links that contain the unlawful content as  
described bellows ("Content"):
